RecipeDef.label: fish
RecipeDef.description: Fish in this area. Catch rate depends on size and depth of the water body.

RecipeDef.label: scoop water (as grower)
RecipeDef.description: Scoop water at this spot. With this a colonist with the growing work type will scoop water form the terrain in buckets. (This is the high priority water scooping job.)

RecipeDef.label: scoop water (as hauler)
RecipeDef.description: Scoop water at this spot. With this a colonist with the hauling work type will scoop water form the terrain in buckets. (This is the low priority water scooping job.)
